amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute sought to insert a complete new text entitled "Corporate and Financial Institution Compensation Fairness Act of 2009".
amendment.purpose: An amendment in the nature of a substitute numbered 2 printed in House Report 111-237 to insert a complete new text entitled "Corporate and Financial Institution Compensation Fairness Act of 2009".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Garrett (NJ) amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 179 - 244 (Roll no. 684).

action.text: Amendment (A002) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Garrett (NJ).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Garrett (NJ).
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Garrett (NJ) amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 179 - 244 (Roll no. 684).
Amendment failed by House: On agreeing to the Garrett (NJ) amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 179 - 244 (Roll no. 684).
